summary: Motivated, multicultural, and goal-oriented young professional who strives to positively impact HR practices while building business acumen skills.

links.name: BA in Psychology with a Citation in French

entries.title: Harley-Davidson Motor Company
entries.description:
Three-year rotational program across five Centers of Excellence in Human Resources.
Business Services (5/2016-10/2016)
• Facilitated two organizational development workshops.
Developed curriculum for Change Leadership workshop that 40+ employees attended.
• Supported workplace investigations, documented notes, and created case assessments.
• Provided recommendation for new employee orientation in Mexico, Canada, and Brazil.
• Supported employee development review process for 8+ teams.
• Coordinated wellness event that hosted 90+ employees.
Shared Services (Second rotation 05/2016 – Present)
• Prepared severance letters for employees during restructuring of company.
• Led change management work for implementation of new time tracking system in the US and Canada.
• Developed online training for 700+ employees in the US and Canada.
• Implemented biweekly newsletter to improve communication within HR Service Center.
• Led change management work for implementation of single sign-on capability for payroll system.

entries.title: Knovva Academy (formerly GiantBug Education)
entries.description:
Start-up company that provides educational programs and resources to local and international students.
• Contributed to the development of strategic initiatives for new academic programs.
• Recruited teachers and speakers for summer program.
• Coordinated summer program for high school students from China.
• Traveled to China four times to deliver presentations and recruit students.

entries.title: Contact
entries.description:
Peer counseling group focused on issues of sexual orientation, sexuality, and relationships.
• Provided non-judgmental, non-directive, and confidential peer counseling to Harvard undergraduates.
• Staffed peer counseling room 5 hours per week.

entries.title: Harvard Taiwan Leadership Conference
entries.description:
Organization dedicated to holding a week-long conference to expose Taiwanese high school students to leadership workshops.
• Led recruitment initiatives to hire Harvard students as teachers.
• Planned conference workshops and extra-curricular activities.
• Managed 1,084 applications from Taiwanese students and made the final selection of 84 students.
• Handled disciplinary issues of 84 students and 25 staff members during the conference.

entries.title: RoLa Languages
entries.description:
Language institute that offers Spanish, French, and Portuguese classes to students of all ages and backgrounds.
• Developed curriculum for beginner and intermediate Spanish classes for adults.
• Taught English and Spanish classes in-person and online to national and international students.
• Created video series of online Spanish classes.

entries.title: International Academic Alliance
entries.description: •  Taught English curriculum to Chinese high school students and led dance extra-curricular activity

entries.title: Harvard Youth Leadership Initiative
entries.description:
Organization that provides free weekly leadership courses for middle school students.
• Recruited Harvard students as teachers.
• Supervised and provided workshops on negotiation, public speaking, time-management, and goal setting.

entries.title: Nock Laboratory for Clinical Psychology
entries.description: Provided assistance in a study of suicide attempts in the military

entries.title: Harvard College Social Enterprise Association
entries.description: Organization dedicated to plan a Spring Break trip to teach English at a non-profit middleschool for children of migrant workers

entries.title: Harvard Student Agencies
entries.description: •  Translated official documents as well as live translations for HSA, the largest student-run company in the world

entries.title: McNally Laboratory for Emotional Disorders,
entries.description:
• Ran clinically depressed participants through computer study.
• Transcribed and coded interviews of participants with complicated grief.

entries.title: Six Sigma Yellow Belt
entries.description: Created standard job description template that Harley-Davidson will utilize globally
